name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia, are you okay？
Cordelia pulls the coat's hood all the way over her head and desperately follows me, even as her feet slip on the rain-slick brick pavement.
The rain pours mercilessly onto her frail shoulders, and it looks like the coat's gotten pretty heavy from soaking up all that water.

name: Cordelia
message: Y-yeah, I'm okay.
No one's watching us, right？

name: Jonathan
message: I don't know.
After all, the whole village worships Dagon......
Cordelia doesn't complain at all, and even though she's out of breath, she doesn't slow down.
Just a bit more, barely half a mile to go......

name: Jonathan
message: We're almost at the bridge.
If we can just get across, we'll figure something out.

name: Cordelia
message: Let's hurry.
We have to get out of the village before someone comes after us...

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan......

name: Cordelia
message: The bridge... the bridge is gone...

name: Cordelia
message: What the hell happened！
Why does this kind of thing have to happen now...

name: Jonathan
message: Damn it......

name: Cordelia
message: Ah... this is just too cruel.

name: Jonathan
message: Shit... what are we supposed to do now.

name: Cordelia
message: It's because of the rain.

name: Cordelia
message: The bridge that was already falling apart finally collapsed because of this rain.

name: Jonathan
message: No, that's not it.

name: Jonathan
message: Look at this.

name: Jonathan
message: This cut has to have been made by a sharp blade.

name: Cordelia
message: Why would someone do something like that...

name: Cordelia
message: That's terrible... How could something like this...

name: Jonathan
message: Damn it！
They found out a long time ago...

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan？

name: Jonathan
message: They know we’re trying to escape, and they’re toying with us！

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, calm down.

name: Cordelia
message: What should we do... What are we supposed to do...

name: Jonathan
message: What else? We just have to find another way out of the village.

name: Cordelia
message: How？

name: Cordelia
message: The only way to leave the village is by crossing this bridge.

name: Jonathan
message: No, there has to be another way.

name: Jonathan
message: Something...

name: Cordelia
message: What about the railway bridge?

name: Jonathan
message: The railway bridge？

name: Cordelia
message: There’s an old bridge the train used to run on.

name: Jonathan
message: That’s it.

name: Cordelia
message: But it's really old, and it might be dangerous.
And　with　this　rain,　our　feet　could　slip—it's　risky.

name: Jonathan
message: We can’t worry about that now.

name: Jonathan
message: Let's hurry！
I'm gonna outsmart those guys.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, is it really okay for you to be here？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, they're probably relieved after dropping the bridge.
They　probably　haven't　even　noticed　there's　a　railway　bridge.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah......

name: Jonathan
message: どのみちこの雨では、セイラムまで走り続けるのは無　　　　　　　　理だ、しばらく休んでいこう。

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder if we'll make it there safely.

name: Jonathan
message: I'll make it there, no matter what.
You should get a little sleep, I'll wake you up in a bit.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan...

name: Jonathan
message: What's up？

name: Cordelia
message: You're not gonna leave me behind, right......

name: Jonathan
message: 当たり前じゃないか。

name: Cordelia
message: Really？

name: Jonathan
message: If I was going to leave you behind, I wouldn't have done any of this from the start, right？

name: Cordelia
message: But......I'm scared.
I'm scared that I might be left behind by someone important to me again.

name: Jonathan
message: You don't have to worry.
Just go to sleep already. It's not like you can rest for that long anyway.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah......

name: Jonathan
message: Damn... did I fall asleep?

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan？

name: Cordelia
message: What's wrong......

name: Jonathan
message: Looks like I dozed off.
I was having a dream.

name: Cordelia
message: What time is it now？

name: Jonathan
message: I don't know.
It's still dark outside, so it seems like there's still some time until dawn.

name: Cordelia
message: Are we leaving already？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah......

name: Jonathan
message: What was that sound？

name: Cordelia
message: What's wrong......

name: Jonathan
message: That is......

name: Jonathan
message: What the heck is that......

name: Jonathan
message: What the hell...

name: Cordelia
message: Wh-what is this...

name: Jonathan
message: That monster... Is this a continuation of my dream...？

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, what's that？

name: Jonathan
message: There's no way a creature like that could exist in real life！
Those guys... in the dream...

name: Jonathan
message: I was being controlled by a man with a strange book,
That's all there is to it.

name: Jonathan
message: Did that really happen...？

name: Cordelia
message: Over here... come over here.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan！

name: Jonathan
message: Even now, somewhere, is that guy controlling them？

name: Cordelia
message: What's wrong？

name: Jonathan
message: Why, in a place like this... Are they fish？ Or human？ That shape... Yeah, just like those ruins...

name: Jonathan
message: That mural, was it depicting those guys?！
But... from that long ago... What are they？

name: Jonathan
message: The gravekeeper said the ruins belong to the Dagon Cult.
The Dagon Cult, the god Dagon... you mean that monster？

name: Cordelia
message: Hey... come on, pull yourself together... Jonathan！

name: Jonathan
message: No way, if it's something that's supposed to be worshipped as a god, then why was it being controlled by a guy like that？ That guy......that book？

name: Jonathan
message: ........Necronomicon........！

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan！

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia......

name: Cordelia
message: What do we do, what's going to happen to us？

name: Jonathan
message: Let's go home.

name: Cordelia
message: Go home......

name: Jonathan
message: We're going back to Arkham！

name: Cordelia
message: And then what are we supposed to do once we're back?！
We're gonna get killed by Dagon's followers.

name: Jonathan
message: Like hell I'm gonna let myself get killed.
It's　okay,　I　know　what　I　need　to　do！

name: Cordelia
message: What are you planning to do？

name: Jonathan
message: It's after we get home.
Everything　will　be　after　we　get　back　to　Arkham......
私たちは身体を叩く雨さえ気にならないほど怯えて、必死の思いで魚鱗亭に戻ってきた。
Just before dawn, the fireplace in Gardner's room was blazing brightly, and inside the room was so comfortable it felt like a different world from the icy rain pouring down outside.

name: Gardner
message: I see, is that all you've got to say？
ガードナーは私を異常者でも見るような目で凝視している。
Unless you've seen it with your own eyes, there's no way you could understand, but it pisses me off to be so blatantly treated like a lunatic.

name: Jonathan
message: You don't believe my story, do you？

name: Gardner
message: You can't deny it was something hard to understand, right？　　　　　　　　Maybe you were just dreaming.

name: Cordelia
message: No way... I saw it too, you know.
That wasn't just a dream！

name: Gardner
message: This is a problem......I'm not an expert in psychology or anything.
But I think that's just some kind of mass hallucination.

name: Thomas
message: For that, isn't the story making a little too much sense？
I just can't think of all that talk about the Ruins and Dagon's bunch as the ramblings of some lunatic.

name: Gardner
message: Are you saying that too now?
How am I supposed to believe that story！

name: Jonathan
message: Anyway, please give me some time.
I'll figure everything out right away.

name: Gardner
message: What are you planning to do？

name: Jonathan
message: I'm going to look for a book.

name: Gardner
message: A book? What are you talking about?

name: Jonathan
message: It's a book called the 'Necronomicon' that appeared in my dream. The guy who was controlling those monsters at will was reading that book.

name: Gardner
message: Fine.

name: Gardner
message: Do as you please.
The bridge has collapsed anyway, right？

name: Gardner
message: So we really did end up trapped in this village.　　　　　　　　Seriously, I can't believe there’s actually an isolated island in the middle of nowhere like this in this day and age.

name: Jonathan
message: If we just have that book, we'll be saved.
If we can control the monsters, we can escape the village safely.

name: Gardner
message: That's enough.
Anyway, no matter what we do, we gotta wait until dawn.

name: Gardner
message: There's a little time to sleep, you two look like you're way too tired.

name: Jonathan
message: What about Cordelia？

name: Gardner
message: She can sleep in your Bed.
We're not at the point where we need to get embarrassed over this, are we？

name: Jonathan
message: If you do that on your own, Mrs. Hudson will get mad.
I should say something first...

name: Gardner
message: Hudson's already disappeared without a trace.
That's why I can't even serve you guys a hot cup of tea.

name: Jonathan
message: Mr. Hudson？
Where on earth did they go?

name: Gardner
message: I don't get anything anymore.
I'm starting to even doubt my own sanity.

name: Jonathan
message: Mrs. Hudson is......

name: Gardner
message: You should take a break now.
In just a few more hours, the night will be over.
